tths_tom_01.title: TRUTH or MYTH
tths_tom_01.description: Transition to High School Truth or Myth 01

actors.name: tths_tom_q01
actors.text: Every student entering high school will have to go through some type of initiation or hazing by upperclassmen.

args.name: tths_tom_01_answer
args.text: That’s a MYTH. Usually it’s all talk. Sometimes not knowing what to expect can be the biggest cause of our fears. But if you do see or experience any incidents of hazing or intimidation, it’s important not to dismiss or ignore the behavior and immediately talk to a trusted adult, such as a parent, teacher, counselor, or another adult at your school.

args.name: tths_tom_01_answer
args.text: That’s a MYTH. Usually it’s all talk. Sometimes not knowing what to expect can be the biggest cause of our fears. But if you do see or experience any incidents of hazing or intimidation, it’s important not to dismiss or ignore the behavior and immediately talk to a trusted adult, such as a parent, teacher, counselor, or another adult at your school.

tths_tom_02.title: TRUTH or MYTH
tths_tom_02.description: Transition to High School Truth or Myth 02

actors.name: tths_tom_q02
actors.text: High school friendships and relationships can contain a lot of drama.

args.name: tths_tom_02_answer
args.text: That’s TRUE. A lot of freshmen do get wrapped up in drama, rumors and gossip, but you’ll be a lot happier and less stressed if you can separate yourself from that drama. Remind yourself to not repeat rumors or spread gossip, and choose to hang out with friends who are drama-free.

args.name: tths_tom_02_answer
args.text: That’s TRUE. A lot of freshmen do get wrapped up in drama, rumors and gossip, but you’ll be a lot happier and less stressed if you can separate yourself from that drama. Remind yourself to not repeat rumors or spread gossip, and choose to hang out with friends who are drama-free.

tths_tom_03.title: TRUTH or MYTH
tths_tom_03.description: Transition to High School Truth or Myth 03

actors.name: tths_tom_q03
actors.text: Anything you post online, including pictures, texts, comments, e-mails, and IMs, can still be found, even if you think you deleted them.

args.name: tths_tom_03_answer
args.text: That’s the TRUTH. Almost everything done online or on a cell phone is traceable, and once posted electronically it exists virtually forever. Cyberbullies can be traced through their electronic messages, whether it’s from a text, social network site or e-mail. So think twice before posting, and if you feel you’ve been targeted, go immediately to a trusted adult and explain the situation.

args.name: tths_tom_03_answer
args.text: That’s the TRUTH. Almost everything done online or on a cell phone is traceable, and once posted electronically it exists virtually forever. Cyberbullies can be traced through their electronic messages, whether it’s from a text, social network site or e-mail. So think twice before posting, and if you feel you’ve been targeted, go immediately to a trusted adult and explain the situation.

tths_tom_04.title: TRUTH or MYTH
tths_tom_04.description: Transition to High School Truth or Myth 04

actors.name: tths_tom_q04
actors.text: People slapping or grabbing other people’s butts in the hallway is just part of high school fun.

args.name: tths_tom_04_answer
args.text: That’s a MYTH. Actually, any unwanted sexual attention, such as touching, groping, slapping or grabbing, is considered sexual harassment and should never be tolerated. If you’re uncomfortable with an action, even if it’s by a friend, tell them to stop, then talk to an adult.

args.name: tths_tom_04_answer
args.text: That’s a MYTH. Actually, any unwanted sexual attention, such as touching, groping, slapping or grabbing, is considered sexual harassment and should never be tolerated. If you’re uncomfortable with an action, even if it’s by a friend, tell them to stop, then talk to an adult.

tths_tom_05.title: TRUTH or MYTH
tths_tom_05.description: Transition to High School Truth or Myth 05

actors.name: tths_tom_q05
actors.text: The classes in high school are harder than middle school and will require good organization skills and lots of studying.

args.name: tths_tom_05_answer
args.text: That’s the TRUTH. For many, the move from middle school to high school can be challenging, but there are some things you can do to ease the transition. Get a planner to help you keep up with reading, homework assignments and deadlines, as well as dates for upcoming quizzes and tests. You may want to cut down or limit time spent playing on the computer, playing video games, talking on the phone or texting and even watching TV. Remember, talk to your teachers when you have questions or feel overwhelmed with the workload.

args.name: tths_tom_05_answer
args.text: That’s the TRUTH. For many, the move from middle school to high school can be challenging, but there are some things you can do to ease the transition. Get a planner to help you keep up with reading, homework assignments and deadlines, as well as dates for upcoming quizzes and tests. You may want to cut down or limit time spent playing on the computer, playing video games, talking on the phone or texting and even watching TV. Remember, talk to your teachers when you have questions or feel overwhelmed with the workload.

tths_video.title: Real Life Advice
tths_video.description: Transition to High School video Real Life Advice

tths_lesson_01.title: Transitioning from middle to high school

actors.name: tths_lesson_title
actors.text: Transitioning from middle to high school

args.name: tths_lesson_03_addText1
args.text: Don't be afraid to ask for help!

args.name: tths_lesson_09_item1
args.text: Adjustment takes time but is temporary.
